[]()[]()[]()[]()[]()[]()[]()[]() <span lang="zh-CN">虚拟机层跟中间层接口</span>![](data:image/png;base64,) {#虚拟机层跟中间层接口 .western style="page-break-before: always"}


1.  

<span
lang="zh-CN">所有在此虚拟机上执行有关于数据的保存，两个字节以及四个字节的都是低位保存在前高位保存在后。</span>

2.  

<span lang="zh-CN">虚拟机请求数据：</span>

  ---------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------
  <span lang="zh-CN">**标示**</span>             <span lang="zh-CN">**数据长度**</span>       <span lang="zh-CN">**数据**</span>

  2<span lang="zh-CN">个字节</span>              2<span lang="zh-CN">个字节</span>            <span lang="zh-CN">二进制数据</span>:0x56 0x23 0x10
                                                                                              
  <span lang="zh-CN">低位在前高位在后</span>     <span lang="zh-CN">低位在前高位在后</span>   
                                                                                              
  Forexample:5000                                                                             
                                                                                              
  <span lang="zh-CN">内存表示</span>:0x88 0x13                                                
  ---------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------

\

<span
lang="zh-CN">中间层响应数据，解析请求的数据格式，执行指令，返回数据</span>(<span
lang="zh-CN">长度</span>+<span lang="zh-CN">数据</span>)

  -------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------
  <span lang="zh-CN">**数据长度**</span>       <span lang="zh-CN">**数据**</span>

  2<span lang="zh-CN">个字节</span>            <span lang="zh-CN">二进制数据</span>
                                               
  <span lang="zh-CN">低位在前高位在后</span>   
  -------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------

\

\
\

3.  

API<span lang="zh-CN">接口函数，与宿主语言</span>C<span
lang="zh-CN">之间的交互都是通过</span>lua<span
lang="zh-CN">解释器自带的虚拟栈实现的。</span>

2.  

<!-- -->

1.  2.  3.  4.  5.  6.  7.  8.  9.  

<!-- -->

3.  

<span lang="zh-CN">使用的全局常量</span>

1.  

--<span lang="zh-CN">脚本应用账户操作类型定义</span>

APP\_OPERATOR\_TYPE =

{

ENUM\_ADD\_FREE\_OP = 1, --<span lang="zh-CN">自由账户加</span>

ENUM\_SUB\_FREE\_OP = 2, --<span lang="zh-CN">自由账户减</span>

ENUM\_ADD\_FREEZED\_OP = 3, --<span lang="zh-CN">冻结账户加</span>

ENUM\_SUB\_FREEZED\_OP = 4 --<span lang="zh-CN">冻结账户减</span>

}

--<span lang="zh-CN">系统账户操作定义</span>

OPER\_TYPE =

{

ENUM\_ADD\_FREE = 1, --<span lang="zh-CN">系统账户加</span>

ENUM\_MINUS\_FREE = 2 --<span lang="zh-CN">系统账户减</span>

}

--<span lang="zh-CN">账户地址类型定义</span>

ADDR\_TYPE =

{

ENUM\_REGID = 1, -- REG\_ID

ENUM\_BASE58 = 2 -- BASE58 ADDR

}

--<span lang="zh-CN">日志输出类型</span>

LOG\_TYPE =

{

ENUM\_STRING = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">字符串类型</span>

ENUM\_NUMBER = 1 --<span lang="zh-CN">数字类型 </span>

}

[]()[]() 3.2<span lang="zh-CN">公共函数</span> {#公共函数 .western style="margin-top: 0.11in; margin-bottom: 0.5in"}
----------------------------------------------

--<span lang="zh-CN">输出</span>table<span
lang="zh-CN">数组所有元素</span>

function Unpack(t,i)

i = i or 1

if t\[i\] then

return t\[i\],Unpack(t,i+1)

end

end

\
\

--<span lang="zh-CN">检测一个表是否为空表</span>

function TableIsEmpty(t)

return \_G.next(t) == nil

end

\
\

--<span lang="zh-CN">检测一个表是否为非空表</span>

function TableIsNotEmpty(t)

return false == TableIsEmpty(t)

end

\
\

--<span lang="zh-CN">输出日志信息</span>

--aKey <span lang="zh-CN">输入日志类型 字符串或数字</span>

--bLength <span lang="zh-CN">打印输出信息的长度</span>

--cValue <span
lang="zh-CN">待输出的信息，字符串类型就是一串字符串，数字类型就是数组</span>

function LogPrint(aKey,bLength,cValue)

assert(bLength &gt;= 1,"LogPrint bLength invlaid")

if(aKey == LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_STRING) then

assert(type(cValue) == "string","LogPrint cValue invlaid0")

elseif(aKey == LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_NUMBER) then

assert(TableIsNotEmpty(cValue),"LogPrint cValue invlaid1")

else

error("LogPrint aKey invlaid")

end

\
\

local logTable = {

key = LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_STRING,

length = 0,

value = nil

}

logTable.key = aKey

logTable.length = bLength

logTable.value = cValue

mylib.LogPrint(logTable)

end

\
\

-- <span lang="zh-CN">打印操作账户的信息</span>

function PrintAppOperate(appOperateTbl)

local locValue = {}

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_STRING,21,"PrintAppOperate start")

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_STRING,8,"AppAccID")

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_NUMBER, appOperateTbl.useridlen,
appOperateTbl.userIdTbl)

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_STRING,3,"tag")

if (appOperateTbl.fundTaglen &gt; 0) then

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_NUMBER, appOperateTbl.fundTaglen,
appOperateTbl.fundTagTbl)

end

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_STRING,11," operatorType")

locValue = { appOperateTbl.operatorType}

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_NUMBER,1,locValue)

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_STRING,9,"outheight")

locValue = nil

locValue = {mylib.IntToByte(appOperateTbl.outHeight)}

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_NUMBER,\#locValue,locValue)

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_STRING,6,"mMoney")

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_NUMBER,8, appOperateTbl.moneyTbl)

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE. ENUM\_STRING,19,"PrintAppOperate end")

end

4.  

<span
lang="zh-CN">本模块主要提供操作系统账户，脚本账户等系统侧的</span>API<span
lang="zh-CN">接口函数</span>,<span
lang="zh-CN">所有的接口函数都封装在</span>mylib<span
lang="zh-CN">库中。**系统内相关函数如下：**</span>

[]()[]()[]()[]()\
\

1.  

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.GetTxAccounts(hashTbl)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">获取指定</span>hash<span
lang="zh-CN">的交易账户</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">交易</span>hash

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：返回交易账户；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_ GetTxAccounts ()

local hash = {0x24, 0x4f, 0xa7, 0xcf, 0x97, 0xae, 0x15, 0x85, 0xd8,
0xf8, 0x02, 0x4b, 0xa1, 0x8b, 0x8a, 0xbe, 0xce, 0x8e, 0xb9, 0xcd, 0x4d,
0x01, 0x6d, 0xd0, 0xba, 0x8c, 0xc0, 0xdc, 0x85, 0x1a, 0x9c, 0x0e}

local accounts = {mylib.GetTxAccounts(Unpack(hash))}

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_NUMBER,\# accounts, accounts)

end

\
\

2.  

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.GetAccountPublickey(accountTbl\[1\],accountTbl\[2\],accountTbl\[3\],accountTbl\[4\],accountTbl\[5\],accountTbl\[6\])

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">获取账户的公钥</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

local accountTbl = {mylib.GetCurTxAccount()}

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：账户的</span>publickey<span
lang="zh-CN">；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_GetAccountPublickey()

local accountTbl = {mylib.GetCurTxAccount()}

local i

\
\

local result =
{mylib.GetAccountPublickey(accountTbl\[1\],accountTbl\[2\],accountTbl\[3\],

accountTbl\[4\],accountTbl\[5\],accountTbl\[6\])}

assert(\#result == 33,"GetAccountPublickey err");

for i = 1,\#result do

print("Publickey",i,(result\[i\]))

end

end

\
\

3.  

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.QueryAccountBalance(unpack(accountTbl))

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">获取账户的余额</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

local accountTbl = {mylib.GetCurTxAccount()}

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：账户的余额；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_QueryAccountBalance()

local accountTbl = {mylib.GetCurTxAccount()}

local i

local result = {mylib.QueryAccountBalance(unpack(accountTbl))}

assert(\#result == 8,"QueryAccountBalance err");

for i = 1,\#result do

print("Balance",i,(result\[i\]))

end

end

\
\

4.  

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.GetTxConFirmHeight(unpack(txhashTbl))

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">获取指定</span>hash<span
lang="zh-CN">交易的确认高度</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">交易</span>hash

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：交易确认高度；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_GetTxConFirmHeight()

-- "hash"
:"4a2af2d83683325e780f2b859e7421f4592e3105d01017aab45c15da3910be8e"

local txhashTbl = {0x4a,0x2a,0xf2,0xd8,0x36,0x83,0x32,0x5e,

0x78,0x0f,0x2b,0x85,0x9e,0x74,0x21,0xf4,

0x59,0x2e,0x31,0x05,0xd0,0x10,0x17,0xaa,

0xb4,0x5c,0x15,0xda,0x39,0x10,0xbe,0x8e}

\
\

local result = mylib.GetTxConFirmHeight(unpack(txhashTbl))

assert(result &gt; 0,"GetTxConFirmHeight err");

end

\
\

5.  

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.GetBlockHash(height)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">获取指定块</span>hash

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">块的高度</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：块</span>hash<span
lang="zh-CN">值；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_GetBlockHash()

local height = 47037

local i

local result = {mylib.GetBlockHash(height)}

assert(\#result == 32,"GetBlockHash err");

for i = 1,\#result do

print("BlockHash",i,(result\[i\]))

end

end

\
\

\
\

6.  

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.GetCurRunEnvHeight()

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">获取当前运行高度 </span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：块的高度；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_GetCurRunEnvHeight()

local result = mylib.GetCurRunEnvHeight()

assert(result &gt; 0,"GetCurRunEnvHeight err");

print("RunEnvHeight",result)

end

\
\

\
\

7.  

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.WriteData(writeDbTbl)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">写脚本数据库</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

local writeDbTbl = {

key = "config", --<span lang="zh-CN">关键字</span>

length = 0, -- value<span lang="zh-CN">数据流的总长</span>

value = {} --<span lang="zh-CN">值</span>

}

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：执行成功；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_WriteData()

local writeDbTbl = {

key = "config", --<span lang="zh-CN">关键字</span>

length = 0, -- value<span lang="zh-CN">数据流的总长</span>

value = {} --<span lang="zh-CN">值</span>

}

addressTbl = {0x64,0x63,0x6D,0x43,0x62,0x4B,0x62,0x41,

0x66,0x4B,0x72,0x6F,0x66,0x4E,0x7A,0x33,

0x35,0x4D,0x53,0x46,0x75,0x70,0x78,0x72,

0x78,0x34,0x55,0x77,0x6E,0x33,0x76,0x67,

0x6A,0x4C}

--<span lang="zh-CN">每次限额</span>,<span
lang="zh-CN">每日限额</span>,<span
lang="zh-CN">企业登记的账户地址</span>

writeDbTbl.value = {0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x64,

0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x2C,

unpack(addressTbl)}

writeDbTbl.length = \#writeDbTbl.value

assert(mylib.WriteData(writeDbTbl),"WriteData err")

end

\
\

8.  

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.DeleteData(key)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">删除脚本数据库</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">关键字</span>key =“config”

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：</span>true<span
lang="zh-CN">；失败：</span>false

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_ DeleteData ()

local writeDbTbl = {

key = "config", --<span lang="zh-CN">关键字</span>

length = 0, -- value<span lang="zh-CN">数据流的总长</span>

value = {} --<span lang="zh-CN">值</span>

}

assert(mylib.DeleteData(writeDbTbl.key),"DeleteData err")

print("DeleteData return ok")

local readResult = {}

readResult = {mylib.ReadData(writeDbTbl.key)}

if(TableIsEmpty(readResult)) then

print("DeleteData ok")

end

end

\
\

9.  

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.ReadData(key)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">根据指定的</span>key<span
lang="zh-CN">读取脚本数据库中的记录</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">关键字</span>key =“config”

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：返回</span>value<span
lang="zh-CN">；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_ ReadData ()

local key =“config”

local readResult = {mylib.ReadData(key)}

assert(\#readResult &gt; 0,"ReadData0 err")

local i

for i = 1,\#readResult do

print("",i,(readResult\[i\]))

end

end

\
\

\
\

10. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.ModifyData(writeDbTbl)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">修改脚本数据库内容</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

local writeDbTbl = {

key = "config", --<span lang="zh-CN">关键字</span>

length = 0, -- value<span lang="zh-CN">数据流的总长</span>

value = {} --<span lang="zh-CN">值</span>

}

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：</span>True<span
lang="zh-CN">；失败：</span>false

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_ ModifyData ()

local writeDbTbl = {

key = "config", --<span lang="zh-CN">关键字</span>

length = 0, -- value<span lang="zh-CN">数据流的总长</span>

value = {} --<span lang="zh-CN">值</span>

}

addressTbl = {0x64,0x63,0x6D,0x43,0x62,0x4B,0x62,0x41,

0x66,0x4B,0x72,0x6F,0x66,0x4E,0x7A,0x33,

0x35,0x4D,0x53,0x46,0x75,0x70,0x78,0x72,

0x78,0x34,0x55,0x77,0x6E,0x33,0x76,0x67,

0x6A,0x4C}

--<span lang="zh-CN">每次限额</span>,<span
lang="zh-CN">每日限额</span>,<span
lang="zh-CN">企业登记的账户地址</span>

writeDbTbl.value = {0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x64,

0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x2C,

unpack(addressTbl)}

writeDbTbl.length = \#writeDbTbl.value

writeDbTbl.value\[8\] = 200

assert(mylib.ModifyData(writeDbTbl),"ModifyData err")

print("ModifyData ok")

readResult = {}

readResult = {mylib.ReadData(writeDbTbl.key)}

assert(\#readResult &gt; 0,"ReadData1 err")

print("ReadData1 ok")

for i = 1,\#readResult do

print("",i,(readResult\[i\]))

end

end

\

\
\

11. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.LogPrint(LogTable)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">保存日志信息</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">待保存的内容</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

--<span lang="zh-CN">日志输出类型</span>

LOG\_TYPE =

{

ENUM\_STRING = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">字符串类型</span>

ENUM\_NUMBER = 1 --<span lang="zh-CN">数字类型 </span>

};

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

\

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_ LogPrint ()

local LogTable = {

key = LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_STRING, --<span lang="zh-CN">日志类型</span>

length = 0, --value<span lang="zh-CN">数据流的总长</span>

value = nil -- <span lang="zh-CN">字符串或数字流</span>

}

--<span lang="zh-CN">保存字符串</span>

LogTable.length = 9

LogTable.value = "lua start"

mylib.LogPrint(LogTable)

--<span lang="zh-CN">保存数据流</span>

LogTable.key = LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_NUMBER

LogTable.length = 20

local i

for i = 1,20 do

LogTable.value \[i\] = i

end

mylib.LogPrint(LogTable)

end

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

\

\

\

13. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.WriteOutput(writeOutputTbl)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">操作系统账户</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

local writeOutputTbl = {

addrType = 1, --<span lang="zh-CN">账户类型 </span>REG\_ID =
0x01,BASE\_58\_ADDR = 0x02,

accountIdTbl = {}, --account id

operatorType = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">操作类型</span>

outHeight = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">超时高度</span>

moneyTbl = {} --<span lang="zh-CN">金额</span>

}

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：</span>True<span
lang="zh-CN">；失败：</span>False

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function WriteWithDrawal(accTbl,moneyTbl)

--<span lang="zh-CN">执行系统账户提现操作</span>

assert(TableIsNotEmpty(accTbl),"WriteWithDrawal accTbl invlaid1")

assert(TableIsNotEmpty (moneyTbl),"WriteWithDrawal moneyTbl invlaid1")

local writeOutputTbl = {

addrType = 1, --<span lang="zh-CN">账户类型 </span>REG\_ID =
0x01,BASE\_58\_ADDR = 0x02,

accountIdTbl = {}, --account id

operatorType = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">操作类型</span>

outHeight = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">超时高度</span>

moneyTbl = {} --<span lang="zh-CN">金额</span>

}

writeOutputTbl.accountIdTbl = {unpack(accTbl)}

writeOutputTbl.operatorType = OPER\_TYPE. ENUM\_ADD\_FREE

writeOutputTbl.moneyTbl = {unpack(moneyTbl)}

assert(mylib.WriteOutput(writeOutputTbl),"WriteWithDrawal WriteOutput
err0")

writeOutputTbl.operatorType = OPER\_TYPE. ENUM\_MINUS\_FREE

writeOutputTbl.accountidTbl = {mylib.GetScriptID()}

assert(mylib.WriteOutput(writeOutputTbl),"WriteWithDrawal WriteOutput
err1")

end

\
\

14. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.GetScriptData(paraTbl)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">获取脚本数据</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

local paraTbl = {

id = {0x00,0x01,0x00,0x00,0xb7,0xc4}, --6<span
lang="zh-CN">字节的脚本</span>id

key = "config", --<span lang="zh-CN">关键字</span>

}

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：脚本数据；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_GetScriptData()

mylib\_WriteData()

local paraTbl = {

--id = {0x00,0x01,0x00,0x00,0xb7,0xc4}, --6<span
lang="zh-CN">字节的脚本</span>id

id = {mylib.GetScriptID()},

key = "config", --<span lang="zh-CN">关键字</span>

}

\
\

local result = {mylib.GetScriptData(paraTbl)}

assert(\#result &gt; 0,"GetScriptData err")

\
\

for i = 1,\#result do

print("GetScriptData",i,(result\[i\]))

end

end

idValueTbl = {} --id<span lang="zh-CN">值</span>

}

\

lang="zh-CN">值</span>

}

end

end

20. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.WriteOutAppOperate(app\_operateTbl)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">操作系统应用账户</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

local app\_operateTbl = {

operatorType = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">操作类型</span>

outHeight = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">超时高度</span>

moneyTbl = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">金额</span>

userIdLen = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">账户</span>ID<span
lang="zh-CN">长度</span>

userIdTbl = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">账户</span>ID

fundTagLen = 0, --fund tag len

fundTagTbl = {} --fund tag

}

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：</span>True<span
lang="zh-CN">；失败：</span>False

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_ WriteOutAppOperate ()

local app\_operateTbl = {

operatorType = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">操作类型</span>

outHeight = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">超时高度</span>

moneyTbl = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">金额</span>

userIdLen = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">账户</span>ID<span
lang="zh-CN">长度</span>

userIdTbl = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">账户</span>ID

fundTagLen = 0, --fund tag len

fundTagTbl = {} --fund tag

}

app\_operateTbl.operatorType = AppOperatorTable. ENUM\_ADD\_FREE\_OP

app\_operateTbl.moneyTbl = {0,0,0,0,0,0,1,44}

app\_operateTbl.userIdLen = 6

app\_operateTbl.userIdTbl = {0,0,0,0,2,0}

\
\

assert(mylib.WriteOutAppOperate(app\_operateTbl),"WriteOutAppOperate
err0")

end

21. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.GetBase58Addr(unpack(accountTbl))

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">获取指定账户的</span>base58<span
lang="zh-CN">地址</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

local accountTbl = {5,157,0,0,7,34} --6<span
lang="zh-CN">字节的账户</span>ID

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：</span>base58<span
lang="zh-CN">地址；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_GetBase58Addr()

local accountTbl = {5,157,0,0,7,34} --6<span
lang="zh-CN">字节的账户</span>ID

local result = {mylib.GetBase58Addr(unpack(accountTbl))}

assert(\#result &gt; 0,"GetBase58Addr err")

if(\#result &gt; 0) then

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE.NUMBER,\#result,result)

end

end

22. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib. ByteToInteger (byteTbl\[1\], byteTbl \[2\], byteTbl \[3\],
byteTbl \[4\])

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">将字节转换成</span>number

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

4<span lang="zh-CN">字节流或</span>8<span
lang="zh-CN">字节的字节流</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：</span>Integer<span
lang="zh-CN">高度值或金额值；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_ByteToInteger()

local height = mylib.ByteToInteger(0xa0,0x05,0x00,0x00)

assert(height &gt; 0,"ByteToInteger error0")

print("height=",height)

local money =
mylib.ByteToInteger(0x78,0x56,0x34,0x12,0x78,0x56,0x34,0x12)

assert(money &gt; 0,"ByteToInteger error1")

print("money=",money)

end

\
\

23. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib. IntegerToByte4 (height)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">将</span>Interger<span
lang="zh-CN">的高度值转换成</span>4<span lang="zh-CN">字节</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

Integer<span lang="zh-CN">高度值</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：返回</span>4<span
lang="zh-CN">个字节；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_IntegerToByte()

local height = 1440

local result = {mylib.IntegerToByte4(height)}

assert(\#result == 4,"IntegerToByte4 error0")

local i

print("height byte")

for i = 1,\#result do

print("",i,(result\[i\]))

end

end

24. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib. IntegerToByte8 (money)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">将</span>Integer<span
lang="zh-CN">的高度值转换成</span>8<span lang="zh-CN">字节</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

Integer<span lang="zh-CN">金额值</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：返回</span>8<span
lang="zh-CN">个字节；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_IntegerToByte8()

local money = 1311768465173141112

local result = {mylib.IntegerToByte8(money)}

assert(\#result == 8,"IntegerToByte8 error0")

for i = 1,\#result do

print("",i,(result\[i\]))

end

end

\
\

25. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.Sha256(string)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

Sha256 hash<span lang="zh-CN">加密算法</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">待加密的内容</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">加密输出，成功返回一个</span>table<span
lang="zh-CN">，否则</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_Sha256 ()

local orgContent = "123"

local content = {mylib.Sha256(orgContent)}

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_NUMBER,\#content,content)

end

\
\

26. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.Des(desTbl)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

Des<span lang="zh-CN">加密算法</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">待加密的内容</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

local desTbl =

{

dataLen = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">加密数据长度</span>

data = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">加密数据</span>

keyLen = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">私钥长度</span>

key = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">私钥数据</span>

flag = 1 --1<span lang="zh-CN">加密 </span>0<span
lang="zh-CN">解密</span>

}

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">加密输出，成功返回一个</span>table<span
lang="zh-CN">，否则</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_Des ()

local desTbl =

{

dataLen = 8,

data = {},

keyLen = 8,

key = {},

flag = 1

}

\
\

desTbl.data = {0xad, 0xdd, 0x1e, 0x1b, 0xeb, 0x8c, 0x10, 0x8d}

for i = 1,8 do

desTbl.key\[i\] = 0x33 + i

end

desTbl.flag = 0

local content = {mylib.Des(desTbl)}

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_NUMBER,\#content,content)

end

\
\

27. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.VerifySignature(sigTbl)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">验证签名</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">待验证的内容</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

local sigTbl =

{

dataLen =0, --<span lang="zh-CN">数据长度</span>

data = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">签名数据</span>

keyLen = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">签名公钥长度</span>

key = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">签名公钥</span>

hashLen = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">签名之前的</span>hash<span
lang="zh-CN">长度</span>

hash = {} --<span lang="zh-CN">签名</span>hash

}

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

true<span lang="zh-CN">：验证成功，</span>false<span
lang="zh-CN">：失败</span>

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_ VerifySignature ()

local sigTbl =

{

dataLen = 9,

data = {0x31, 0x32, 0x33, 0x34, 0x35, 0x36, 0x37, 0x38, 0x39},

keyLen = 33,

key = {0x03, 0xee, 0xf7, 0xa3, 0x80, 0xbc, 0xf9, 0xcf, 0x97, 0x5d, 0x91,
0x6f, 0xda, 0xb1, 0x8d, 0x08, 0x1c, 0x9d, 0x55, 0xba, 0x43, 0x46, 0x54,
0x35, 0xa4, 0xd1, 0xcc, 0x59, 0x86, 0x10, 0xa4, 0x44, 0x79},

hashLen = 32,

hash = {0x24, 0x4f, 0xa7, 0xcf, 0x97, 0xae, 0x15, 0x85, 0xd8, 0xf8,
0x02, 0x4b, 0xa1, 0x8b, 0x8a, 0xbe, 0xce, 0x8e, 0xb9, 0xcd, 0x4d, 0x01,
0x6d, 0xd0, 0xba, 0x8c, 0xc0, 0xdc, 0x85, 0x1a, 0x9c, 0x0e}

}

local ret = mylib.VerifySignature(sigTbl)

if ret then

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_STRING,string.len("ok"),"ok")

else

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_STRING,string.len("bad"),"bad")

end

end

\
\

28. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.GetTxContracts(hashTbl)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">获取指定</span>hash<span
lang="zh-CN">的合约内容</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">合约交易</span>hash

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：返回合约内容；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_ GetTxContracts ()

local hash = {0x24, 0x4f, 0xa7, 0xcf, 0x97, 0xae, 0x15, 0x85, 0xd8,
0xf8, 0x02, 0x4b, 0xa1, 0x8b, 0x8a, 0xbe, 0xce, 0x8e, 0xb9, 0xcd, 0x4d,
0x01, 0x6d, 0xd0, 0xba, 0x8c, 0xc0, 0xdc, 0x85, 0x1a, 0x9c, 0x0e}

local content = {mylib.GetTxContracts(Unpack(hash))}

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_NUMBER,\#content,content)

end

\
\

29. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib. TransferContactAsset (Unpack(addrTbl))

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">转移全部资产</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">账户地址</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：</span>True<span
lang="zh-CN">；失败：</span>False

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_TransferContactAsset()

local accountTbl = {5,157,0,0,7,34} --6<span
lang="zh-CN">字节的账户</span>ID

local addrTbl = {mylib.GetBase58Addr(unpack(accountTbl))}

assert(\#addrTbl &gt; 0,"GetBase58Addr err")

assert(mylib.TransferContactAsset(Unpack(addrTbl)),
"TransferContactAsset err")

end

\
\

30. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.TransferSomeAsset (assetOperateTbl)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">转移部分资产</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

local assetOperateTbl = {

toAddrTbl = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">转移目的地址</span>

outHeight = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">高度 </span>

moneyTbl = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">资产数</span>

fundTagLen = 0, --fund tag len

fundTagTbl = {} --fund tag

}

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：</span>True<span
lang="zh-CN">；失败：</span>False

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_TransferSomeAsset()

local accountTbl = {5,157,0,0,7,34} --6<span
lang="zh-CN">字节的账户</span>ID

local addrTbl = {mylib.GetBase58Addr(unpack(accountTbl))}

assert(\#addrTbl &gt; 0,"GetBase58Addr err")

\
\

local assetOperateTbl = {

toAddrTbl = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">转移地址</span>

outHeight = 0, --<span lang="zh-CN">高度 </span>

moneyTbl = {}, --<span lang="zh-CN">资产数</span>

fundTagLen = 0, --fund tag len

fundTagTbl = {} --fund tag

}

\
\

local money = 1311768465173141112

local moneyTbl = {mylib.IntegerToByte8(money)}

\
\

\
\

assetOperateTbl.toAddrTbl = addrTbl

assetOperateTbl.outHeight = 1440

assetOperateTbl.moneyTbl = moneyTbl

assert(mylib.TransferSomeAsset(assetOperateTbl), "TransferSomeAsset
err")

end

\
\

31. 

<span lang="zh-CN">**原型**</span>

mylib.GetBlockTimestamp (height)

<span lang="zh-CN">**功能**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">获取块的时间戳</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**参数**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">**输入**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">块的高度值，如果传入参数</span>&lt;=0<span
lang="zh-CN">，则实际高度为</span>last block <span lang="zh-CN">的高度
</span>- <span lang="zh-CN">传入参数的绝对值；否则实际高度 </span>=
<span lang="zh-CN">传入参数</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**输出**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**常量**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**结构体**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**返回**</span>

<span lang="zh-CN">成功：</span>unix<span
lang="zh-CN">时间戳；失败：</span>nil

\

\

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**注释**</span>

\

<span lang="zh-CN">**示例**</span>

function mylib\_GetBlockTimestamp ()

local ts = mylib.GetBlcokTimestamp(0)

assert(ts \~= nil,"ts is nil")

str = string.format("0:%d", ts)

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_STRING,string.len(str),str)

ts = mylib. GetBlcokTimestamp (100)

assert(ts \~= nil,"ts is nil")

str = string.format("100:%d", ts)

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_STRING,string.len(str),str)

ts = mylib. GetBlcokTimestamp (-100)

assert(ts \~= nil,"ts is nil")

str = string.format("-100:%d", ts)

LogPrint(LOG\_TYPE.ENUM\_STRING,string.len(str),str)

end

\
\
